PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01012024-02-02GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectSpecial Economic Measures (Hamas Terrorist Attacks) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (HAMAS) REGULATIONS in order to add eleven (11) individuals to the Schedule of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0017 Publication Date: 2024-02-14
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (HAMAS) REGULATIONS in order to add eleven (11) individuals to the Schedule of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
